entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who casts a spell that causes blood to spurt from Malfoy's face and chest.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student who is attacked by Harry's spell and falls to the ground, bleeding heavily.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The potions master who bursts into the room, pushes Harry aside, and kneels over Malfoy.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: A ghost who is present in the bathroom and lets out a deafening scream when she sees Malfoy bleeding.

relationships.description: Harry casts a spell that causes blood to spurt from Malfoy's face and chest, indicating an attack.
Snape pushes Harry roughly aside when he bursts into the room.
Snape kneels over Malfoy and draws his wand, indicating that he is tending to Malfoy's injuries.
